---
title: "SAT solver evaluation"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

# Cigan

```{r}
results <- read_csv("results-perf.csv", col_types = "n-f--n-lfffll")

results <- results %>%
    group_by(counter, virtual, cdcl, adjacency, clause, decision) %>%
    summarize(value = mean(value), ratio = mean(ratio), .groups = "keep")

results %>%
    filter(!cdcl, clause == "basic", adjacency == "set_unordered", decision == "deterministic") %>%
    ggplot(aes(fill = counter, x = ratio, y = virtual)) +
    geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat = "identity")
```
